Propiedad [Text] actualizada [The business actors will remain the same as the current ones, with the novelty of User.
- **Owner**: maximum responsible of a restaurant or a chain of restaurants. He delegates his functions to the foreman.
- **Foreman**: skilled person with experience who is in charge of an establishment on behalf of the owner and also watches over a group of workers.
- **Waiter**: Person in charge of taking commands and bringing dishes to the diner.
- **Chef**: Person in charge of preparing and cooking food.
- *Diner**: Customer who comes to the business to consume the services we offer.
- User: Customer who has previously registered on the website to order food and/or to make a reservation ] -> [The business actors will remain the same as the current ones, with the novelty of User.
- **Owner**: maximum responsible of a restaurant or a chain of restaurants. He delegates his functions to the foreman.
- **Foreman**: skilled person with experience who is in charge of an establishment on behalf of the owner and also watches over a group of workers.
- ***Waiter***: Person in charge of taking commands and bringing dishes to the diner.
- **Chef**: Person in charge of preparing and cooking food.
- *Diner**: Customer who comes to the business to consume the services we offer.
- User: Customer who has previously registered on the website to order food and/or to make a reservation ]

Propiedad [Text] actualizada [- Place an order: after you have registered on the website and logged in, fill in a form with the food you want to order and the time you want to pick it up locally. You can also select the option to have the order delivered to a home address. - Reserve a table: after you have registered on the website and logged in, you fill in a form specifying which of the four venues you want to book, at what time you want to reserve a table and, optionally, you can choose what dishes you are going to eat so that when you arrive at the venue, those dishes are already prepared and you don't have to wait too long. You cannot book a table less than one hour in advance - Waiting list management: after you have registered on the website and logged in, you can see the estimated waiting time based on the number of people currently in the venue and the bookings already selected. - Rate dishes: after you have registered on the website, logged in and scanned the invoice for the products consumed, you can rate them. This will form a ranking in which the most ordered dishes and the best rated dishes will participate. ] -> [- Place an order: after you have registered on the website and logged in, fill in a form with the food you want to order and the time you want to pick it up locally. You can also select the option to have the order delivered to a home address.
- Reserve a table: after you have registered on the website and logged in, you fill in a form specifying which of the four venues you want to book, at what time you want to reserve a table and, optionally, you can choose what dishes you are going to eat so that when you arrive at the venue, those dishes are already prepared and you don't have to wait too long. You cannot book a table less than one hour in advance
- Waiting list management: after you have registered on the website and logged in, you can see the estimated waiting time based on the number of people currently in the venue and the bookings already selected.
- Rate dishes: after you have registered on the website, logged in and scanned the invoice for the products consumed, you can rate them. This will form a ranking in which the most ordered dishes and the best rated dishes will participate. ]

Propiedad [Text] actualizada [*apas : Tapas are small Spanish savoury dishes, typically served with drinks at a bar. Tabernas Sevilla sells 60 different tapas classified in 8 categories: dessert, meat, its own kitchen, salad, omelettes, its bar, boards, cheese and cold cuts. These dishes are offered in 3 different quantities, in tapa, half ration and full ration. Their prices range from 2 to 18 euros. All of them can be find at this address : https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-tapas There are some photos of tapas proposed.
vinos : Tabernas Sevilla offers 5 types of wines: The generous, cellar, rosé, white and red. These wines are offered in bottles, and some of them are also available in glass. Prices range from the cheapest glass at 1.8 euros to the most expensive bottle at 35 euros. Guests can ask the waiter what the wine of the week is once on site. They offer a total of 41 different wines. All of them can be find at this adress : https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-vinos
establishments :
Tabernas Sevilla has 4 restaurants in Seville. The one in Porvenir is the first to be opened.
The second is the one in Torneo, 3 years later.
Then came Nervión tavern.
And finally, the one in Arenal.

All of them can be find at this address : https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-tapas There are some photos of tapas proposed.
*vinos :* Tabernas Sevilla offers 5 types of wines: The generous, cellar, rosé, white and red. These wines are offered in bottles, and some of them are also available in glass. Prices range from the cheapest glass at 1.8 euros to the most expensive bottle at 35 euros. Guests can ask the waiter what the wine of the week is once on site. They offer a total of 41 different wines. All of them can be find at this adress : https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-vinos
establishments :
Tabernas Sevilla has 4 restaurants in Seville. The one in Porvenir is the first to be opened.
The second is the one in Torneo, 3 years later.
Then came Nervión tavern.
And finally, the one in Arenal.
review : Our site will have a review system that will allow you to rate and leave comments about the different dishes offered by this restaurant. Thus, customers will be able to be informed of the success of a dish and have more details than a note thanks to the comments.
Delivery and take away system : Our site will offer an online ordering system that can then be either delivered or picked up directly at the desired restaurant. In addition, the details of the order will be available as well as the invoice. The delivery system will display in real time the status of the order with an estimated time of arrival. An estimated time for order pickup will also be provided.
Customers : Customers of Tabernas Sevilla are mostly families and young adults. We noticed that there were very few children when we went there.
Foreman : Tabernas Sevilla's owner is named Pablo Arenas. He is half owner of this business.

Propiedad [Text] actualizada [The business actors will remain the same as the current ones, with the novelty of User.
- **Owner**: maximum responsible of a restaurant or a chain of restaurants. He delegates his functions to the foreman.
- **Foreman**: skilled person with experience who is in charge of an establishment on behalf of the owner and also watches over a group of workers.
- **Waiter**: Person in charge of taking commands and bringing dishes to the diner.
- **Chef**: Person in charge of preparing and cooking food.
- **Diner**: Customer who comes to the business to consume the services we offer.
- **User**: Customer who has previously registered on the website to order food and/or to make a reservation ] -> [The business actors will remain the same as the current ones, with the novelty of User.
- **User**: Customer who has previously registered on the website to order food and/or to make a reservation ]

Propiedad [Text] actualizada [Tapas : Tapas are small Spanish savoury dishes, typically served with drinks at a bar. Tabernas Sevilla sells 60 different tapas classified in 8 categories: dessert, meat, its own kitchen, salad, omelettes, its bar, boards, cheese and cold cuts. These dishes are offered in 3 different quantities, in tapa, half ration and full ration. Their prices range from 2 to 18 euros. All of them can be find at this address : https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-tapas
Wines : Tabernas Sevilla offers 5 types of wines: The generous, cellar, rosé, white and red. These wines are offered in bottles, and some of them are also available in glass. Prices range from the cheapest glass at 1.8 euros to the most expensive bottle at 35 euros. Guests can ask the waiter what the wine of the week is once on site. They offer a total of 41 different wines. All of them can be find at this adress : https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-vinos
Establishments : Tabernas Sevilla has 4 restaurants or taverns in Seville. The one in Porvenir is the first to be opened. The second is the one in Torneo, 3 years later. Then came Nervión tavern. And finally, the one in Arenal.
Review : Our site will have a review system that will allow you to rate and leave comments about the different dishes offered by this restaurant. Thus, customers will be able to be informed of the success of a dish and have more details than a note thanks to the comments.
Delivery and take away system : Our site will offer an online ordering system that can then be either delivered or picked up directly at the desired restaurant. In addition, the details of the order will be available as well as the invoice. The delivery system will display in real time the status of the order with an estimated time of arrival. An estimated time for order pickup will also be provided.
Customers : Customers of Tabernas Sevilla are mostly families and young adults. We noticed that there were very few children when we went there.
Foreman : The person in charge of an establishment, also called the manager. Each tavern has one single foreman.
Owner: Tabernas Sevilla's owner is named Pablo Arenas. He is half owner of this business.

Propiedad [Text] actualizada [Tabernas Sevilla is a successful chain of restaurants offering tapas and glasses. Thus, in view of the numerous customers and potential customers that it has, it seems obvious that a good management of orders and reservations allowing a good efficiency is essential. This is why our system proposes to implement the reservation with the desired dishes as well as a take away system.
Furthermore, in order to increase customer loyalty and to involve them in the restaurant, we plan to implement a social media involvement system including a rating system and other features.] -> [The company for which the creation of our system is intended is called Tabernas Sevilla. This chain of restaurants with 4 establishments in Seville has been serving tapas and wine since 2001.
These restaurants work very well both for regular customers and for passers-by, so we decided to provide new distribution methods and make the existing ones more efficient in order to allow this company to sell more products.
Tabernas Sevilla already has a website that allows the reservation of tables with or without a menu selection beforehand. We intend to add to the website the possibility for customers to have their meals delivered wherever they want around the restaurants. We also plan to add a take away system to avoid waiting for customers. These two systems will make it possible to sell products without being limited by the capacity of the different restaurants of Tabernas Sevilla.
In addition to these new sales methods, we are going to implement a social media involvement system consisting of a review system and others in order to inform the customer and, as its name suggests, involve him in the life of Tabernas Sevilla.
Finally, we have decided to improve the management of the waiting list by allowing us to inform the customer of how much time he or she has left before being able to settle in the restaurant.
All these actions can be carried out via the website once the customer has registered and logged in to their profile.]

Propiedad [Text] actualizada [Adil pasame esto que lo he borrao pisha] -> [Bookings at Tabernas Sevilla can be made either by phone or directly through their website. These are only available for groups of 6 to 20 people and are available until 2:30 pm for lunch and 9:30 pm for dinner. Reservations are not made on the terrace so that there is always room for passers-by.Once the reservation is made, an email will be sent to the customer to pay 25% of the price if he chose his menu during the reservation or 3 euros if he will order on the spot to validate the reservation. If the customer has not chosen a menu during the reservation, then he will not be able to order tapa unless it is the only format of the desired dish. ]

Propiedad [Text] actualizada [When a diner enters the tavern, a waiter must ask them if they would like to take a seat, and then ask them what they would like to drink. Then, after the diner or diners have decided what they would like to eat, the waiter will write it down in the electronic command, and immediately the chefs will start cooking the ordered dishes. Once the food is ready, the chefs will put the dishes in the kitchen window and the waiter will move it to the diners table. When a diner asks for the bill, the waiter will print it with the electronic command and put it in the diners table, wait for them to pay with cash or credit card and say goodbye to them.] -> [When a diner enters the tavern, a waiter must ask them if they would like to take a seat, and then ask them what they would like to drink. Then, after the diner or diners have decided what they would like to eat, the waiter will write it down in the electronic command, and immediately the chefs will start cooking the ordered dishes. Once the food is ready, the chefs will put the dishes in the kitchen window and the waiter will move it to the diners table. When a diner asks for the bill, the waiter will print it with the electronic command and put it in the diners table, wait for them to pay with cash or credit card and say goodbye to them. This process includes P-04.]

Propiedad [Results] actualizada [The day of the meeting we went to the offices of our client, Pablo Arenas. We met around 5pm and the meeting lasted about an hour and a half. He made it clear to us that his main objective is to sell, every improvement or new functionality that we create does not matter if he cannot sell more than now. First, we listened to our client how his company was working and the computerized system he was using ("BDP" it's the software's name) to better understand his business model and how we could improve it or design new functionalities. He explained in depth how the restaurant business works. We asked him some questions about the business and the way he manages it, for example: Do you think your business lacks automation? - "I think we have a pretty computerized business". What are you thinking about to improve your business? - "Some time ago we thought of a system to manage waitlists, but we gave it up for lack of time to manage it. So I listen to your proposals". Finally, we chose between the customer and ourselves what we thought was best for his business, we thought four possible solutions: o The "take away" and "delivery" system (to fulfil the main goal: sell more). o Improvement of the restaurant's waitlist management: o Making possible the online booking without going to the restaurant. o Creating a software that manages face-to-face waiting list automatically. ] -> [The day of the meeting we went to the offices of our client, Pablo Arenas. We met around 5pm and the meeting lasted about an hour and a half. He made it clear to us that his main objective is to sell, every improvement or new functionality that we create does not matter if he cannot sell more than now. First, we listened to our client how his company was working and the computerized system he was using ("BDP" it's the software's name) to better understand his business model and how we could improve it or design new functionalities. He explained in depth how the restaurant business works. We asked him some questions about the business and the way he manages it, for example: Do you think your business lacks automation?
- "I think we have a pretty computerized business". What are you thinking about to improve your business?
- "Some time ago we thought of a system to manage waitlists, but we gave it up for lack of time to manage it. So I listen to your proposals". Finally, we chose between the customer and ourselves what we thought was best for his business, we thought four possible solutions: o The "take away" and "delivery" system (to fulfil the main goal: sell more). o Improvement of the restaurant's waitlist management: o Making possible the online booking without going to the restaurant. o Creating a software that manages face-to-face waiting list automatically. ]

Propiedad [Results] actualizada [The day of the meeting we went to the offices of our client, Pablo Arenas. We met around 5pm and the meeting lasted about an hour and a half. He made it clear to us that his main objective is to sell, every improvement or new functionality that we create does not matter if he cannot sell more than now. First, we listened to our client how his company was working and the computerized system he was using ("BDP" it's the software's name) to better understand his business model and how we could improve it or design new functionalities. We asked him several questions, especially about better features. Finally, we chose between the customer and ourselves what we thought was best for his business, we thought four possible solutions: o The "take away" and "delivery" system (to fulfil the main goal: sell more). o Improvement of the restaurant's waitlist management: o Making possible the online booking without going to the restaurant. o Creating a software that manages face-to-face waiting list automatically. ] -> [The day of the meeting we went to the offices of our client, Pablo Arenas. We met around 5pm and the meeting lasted about an hour and a half. He made it clear to us that his main objective is to sell, every improvement or new functionality that we create does not matter if he cannot sell more than now. First, we listened to our client how his company was working and the computerized system he was using ("BDP" it's the software's name) to better understand his business model and how we could improve it or design new functionalities. He explained in depth how the restaurant business works. We asked him some questions, for example: How long ago did you open the first tavern? Do you think your business lacks automation? What are you thinking about to improve your business? Finally, we chose between the customer and ourselves what we thought was best for his business, we thought four possible solutions: o The "take away" and "delivery" system (to fulfil the main goal: sell more). o Improvement of the restaurant's waitlist management: o Making possible the online booking without going to the restaurant. o Creating a software that manages face-to-face waiting list automatically. ]

Then, after the diner or diners have decided what they would like to eat, the waiter will write it down in their working stations, and immediately the chefs will start cooking the ordered dishes. Once the food is ready, the chefs will put the dishes in the kitchen window and the waiter will move it to the diners table. When a diner asks for the bill, the waiter will print it with the electronic command and put it in the diners table, wait for them to pay with cash or credit card and say goodbye to them. Propiedad [Text] actualizada [Tabernas Sevilla is a well-known chain of restaurants in Seville that has been around since 2001. There are four establishments across the capital, which are usually visited by young adults and families. Its specialty are sevillian tapas and dishes. They also have a very large wine menu
Our system fulfils three fundamental functions for Tabernas Sevilla's business model. It is based on a web page that allows the ordering of commands on-line. Using a computerized web menu, users can select which dishes from Tabernas Sevilla's extensive menu they wish to order and which of the 4 restaurants available throughout Seville to collect them from, giving them an estimated time to collect the order on site or selecting delivery to the previously specified address.
In addition, it has the functionality implemented to manage the capacity of the bar's customers, being able to make table reservations in advance by agreeing on a time, and if desired, also agreeing on the dishes to be consumed. In this way, the client does not have to wait for his dishes when he arrives at the bar but can enjoy them in the best possible way. This helps to solve one of the basic problems of the business, the management of the waiting list, which is currently done by hand by the waiters. ] -> [The company for which the creation of our system is intended is called Tabernas Sevilla. This chain of restaurants with 4 establishments in Seville has been serving tapas and wine since 2001. These restaurants work very well both for regular customers and for passers-by, so we decided to provide new distribution methods and make the existing ones more efficient in order to allow this company to sell more products.
Tabernas Sevilla already has a website that allows the reservation of tables with or without a menu selection beforehand. We intend to add to the website the possibility for customers to have their meals delivered wherever they want around the restaurants. We also plan to add a take away system to avoid waiting for customers. These two systems will make it possible to sell products without being limited by the capacity of the different restaurants of Tabernas Sevilla. In addition to these new sales methods, we are going to implement a social media involvement system consisting of a review system and others in order to inform the customer and, as its name suggests, involve him in the life of Tabernas Sevilla.
Finally, we have decided to improve the management of the waiting list by allowing us to inform the customer of how much time he or she has left before being able to settle in the restaurant. All these actions can be carried out via the website once the customer has registered and logged in to their profile. ]
Creación

Propiedad [Text] actualizada [
Tabernas Sevilla offers 5 types of wines: The generous, cellar, rosé, white and red.
These wines are offered in bottles, and some of them are also available in glass.
Prices range from the cheapest glass at 1.8 euros to the most expensive bottle at 35 euros.
Guests can ask the waiter what the wine of the week is once on site. They offer a total of 41 different wines.
All of them can be find at this adress : https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-vinos ] -> [
Tabernas Sevilla offers 5 types of wines which are the generous, cellar, rosé, white and red for a total of 41 different wines to date.
These wines are offered in bottles whose price starts at 10 euros and can go up to 35 euros but some of them are also available in glass from 1.8 euros to 2.6 euros.
Finally, the customer can ask the waiter and access the history of the wines of the week of this brand, knowing that Tabernas Sevilla offering its wines of the week can be unique to one of the 4 restaurants or common to all.
All of them can be find at this adress : https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-vinos
]

Propiedad [Text] actualizada [
Tapas are small Spanish savoury dishes, typically served with drinks at a bar. Tabernas Sevilla sells 60 different tapas classified in 8 categories: dessert, meat, its own kitchen, salad, omelettes, its bar, boards, cheese and cold cuts.
These dishes are offered in 3 different quantities, in tapa, half ration and full ration.
Their prices range from 2 to 18 euros. All of them can be find at this address : https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-tapas There are some photos of tapas proposed. ] -> [
Tapas are small salty Spanish dishes, usually served with drinks in a bar.Tabernas Sevilla sells 60 different tapas classified in 8 categories which are dessert, meat, own kitchen, salad, omelettes, bar, boards, cheese and cold meats which prices vary between 2 and 18 euros depending on the desired dish and its quantity.
These dishes are offered in 3 different quantities, in tapa, half ration and full ration, however, the tapas portions are only available by reservation if the customer indicates these dishes, otherwise, only the dishes only offered in tapas will be available once on site.
They are all available at this address: https://www.arengalia.es/carta-de-tapas ]

All these actions can be carried out via the website once the customer has registered and logged in to their profile. ] -> [Tabernas Sevilla is a well-known chain of restaurants in Seville that has been around since 2001. Our system fulfils three fundamental functions for Tabernas Sevilla's business model. It is based on a web page that allows the ordering of commands on-line.
